#summary Instructions for getting started developing DataWiki.

= Get =

See the [http://code.google.com/p/datawiki/source/checkout Source] page.

= Build =

{{{
cd <the code directory>
export APP_ENGINE_HOME=<path to your appengine-java-sdk>
ant
}}}

= Run =

{{{
ant server
}}}


= Develop =

CLI building is easy:

{{{
ant classpath
"... export CLASSPATH=..."
<copy and paste that back in to set your classpath>
cd wiki
javac *.java
}}}

Then [http://code.google.com/p/datawiki/issues/entry?show=review&former=sourcelist Request a Code Review] for submission.
